profile:
Protect and improve your number one investment with Shield Kings, a trusted name in home renovation and restoration since 2004.  We have helped improve the homes of over a thousand satisfied clients. Our areas of expertise include basement finishing, washrooms, waterproofing and crack injections, driveway and asphalt sealing and many more. Life is too short to stress over renovations. Call or email us now for a hassle-free, no-obligation consultation.

We're social here:
https://www.facebook.com/Shield-Kings-1864179963720770/
https://www.instagram.com/shieldkings/
https://www.linkedin.com/in/steven-pimentel-193089182
https://twitter.com/ShieldKings

Home
Our Services

Our Services
 

You donâ€™t want to risk your home with inexperienced builders. With over ten years of experience in home improvement and restoration, Shield Kings brings you the best service at a reasonable price. Call us now for a free consultation for an ounce of early prevention could mean a pound of expensive reconstruction!





Home Renovations

 

Basement Finishing

 

Turn that dark room into a beautiful lounge area that you and your family will enjoy for years to come.

 

Washrooms

 

Remodel or rebuild your washroom with brand new materials to add comfort and style in your home.

 

Remodelling

 

We can do any home or garden remodelling from decks to landscaping.

Basement Waterproofing

 

Foundation Repairs

 

Your foundation wall needs extra care due to the pressures it handles from the outside elements and moisture.

 

Foundation Waterproofing

 

Keep everything protected and sealed through our meticulous sealing process to keep harmful moisture out.

 

Crack Injections

 

We seal all cracks to prevent any further damage, keeping your walls protected for all seasons.

Asphalt Sealing

 

Parking Lots

 

We will take care of your asphalt cracks with our clay-based sealer to prevent further damages. Service available for commercial areas.

 

Driveways

 

We keep your driveway protected and sealed through our meticulous process and clay-based sealer. Service available for commercial areas.

profile:
We offer: Concrete Coating, Asphalt Sealing & Epoxy Coating. Power washing services also available 

We also offer a premium crack filling service, stop using fillers, tar strips or rubberized epoxy materials that look awful and do nothing to fill those tedious cracks.

What we do when we arrive to your home or business for asphalt: Get rid of the weeds around the perimeter of the area, clear the area of any dirt, dust & debris, then seal. 

For Concrete: Clear the area of any dirt, dust & debris, power wash wait 24 hours to dry, then coat. 

Power washing services also available for both Asphalt & Concrete

profile:
Guelph Paving commits to give top-quality paving services to its clientele. The knowledge and expertise that we bring to each paving project, ensures the best result each and every time.

Guelph Paving offers driveway paving and commercial asphalt paving services in Guelph, Milton, Halton Hills, Fergus, Elora, Elmira, Kitchener, Waterloo, Cambridge and surrounding areas. We are asphalt paving contractors that specialize solely in paving. Our attention to detail and expertise have been recognized throughout the region by our satisfied clients. 
Our President Bill Hamilton possesses over 20 years of experience with unique challenges of paving in surrounding regions providing a professional, quality-driven job each and every time.
